Posts.Content: Suitland wrote: Just diagnosed and a little overwhelmed. Anyone else have this type? Is it a hard one to treat? I know hormonal therapy is off the board, but was told about herceptin. Meet with oncologist on Wednesday to discuss options. Any words of wisdom would be appreciated. Dx 1/4/2016, IDC, Right, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: PR-, ER-, HER2+ just diagnosised anyone else? Suitland Suitland

Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2016 05:00PM Suitland wrote: thank you guys. These first couple weeks are brutal. So much info and bad news.
